introduction: 该纪录片讲述了宝丽金电影娱乐公司（ PolyGram Filmed Entertainment ，简称PFE）的崛起和没落，这是一家曾制作过《四个婚礼和一个葬礼》、《非常嫌疑犯》、《猜火车》、《两杆大烟枪》、《冰血暴》、《诺丁山》、《成为约翰·马尔科维奇》、《死囚漫步》等著名影片的公司。1999年，菲利普公司将宝丽金电影娱乐公司出卖给西格拉姆集团。100 Films and a Funeral is both a memoir by Michael Kuhn and a 2007 documentary film adaptation by filmmaker Michael McNamara about the rise and fall of PolyGram Filmed Entertainment (PFE), the company that produced Four Weddings and a Funeral, The Usual Suspects, and Trainspotting. Kuhn headed PFE from 1991 till 1999, when Philips sold it to the Seagram conglomerate. The selling of PFE also ended the prominent role of the company in the British film industry revival of the 1990s.
